April 24, 1964
Mrs. Mary Ann Burlington
Rational Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington., D. C. 20036
Dear Mary Ann,
Thank you for your letter of April 9* I appreciate Bill's confidence
and regret that I haven't had time so far to study the problem of
additional committee members for the Public Relations Committee.
Please don't replace any of last year's members automatically since
most of them were "do nothings." Would you please tell me which of
the members will be automatically going off the Committee? Then I can
suggest some names to you for replacements.
I would like to suggest Leontine Keane, Birector of Radio-TV Publicity
for Wayne State University, Detroit, as one additional member for the
coming year. I'll be in touch with you on other names as soon as I
hear from you. Meantime,
All the best.
Marion Corvell
Associate Director
